CustomField.formula: AND( Blended_Discount__c > Approved_Discount__c, Associated_Opportunity_Type__c = 'Revenue Opportunity', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.RecordType.Id = '0121a000000VnUx', SBQQ__Opportunity2__r.Account.RecordType.Id != '0121a000000VnIa' )
CustomField.label: Entry Criteria Met for MV Disc. Blended
